mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_CODE, MEMBER_TEL, DISABLE_DATE, DELETE_DATE, TO_CHAR(ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') ENROLL_DATE, INFO_IMG FROM "MEMBER" LEFT JOIN "MEMBER_INFO" USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE MEMBER_CODE != 'A' ORDER BY MEMBER_NO DESC

SELECT FEEDBACK_NO, MEMBER_NO, FEEDBACK_CONTENT, ADMIN_NO, ADMIN_COMMENT, TO_CHAR(FEEDBACK_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') FEEDBACK_DATE, TO_CHAR(CONFIRM_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') CONFIRM_DATE FROM "FEEDBACK" WHERE FEEDBACK_NO = #{feedbackNo}
